details: Expose a one-click action in Teams UI that calls /teams/setup-scrum and surfaces created artifacts; avoids manual type selection when Scrum defaults are expected.
Show backend error codes from /teams create/update (e.g., invalid_role_for_team_type, role_not_found) so users can fix misconfigurations without guessing.
Update remaining SQLModel .dict() calls to .model_dump() to silence deprecation warnings.
